Sentence.Original: [0]It was Ryan who attacked Dad![1]Then he used Dad in some crazy experiment to[2]try to erase his memories.[3]To stop him, I had to go into Dad's office, unlock[4]Mom's box and take out something he wanted.[5]It was a TAS upgrade module.[6]After getting it, I went back to Ryan.[7]But something's wrong with Dad...[8]
[0]Ryan, what did you do to Dad?[1]

[0]Dad![1]Dad![2]Where...am I?[3]Dad, are you okay?[4]This...isn't MJ Labs.[5]Dad, come on![6]What is this place?[7]Ryan, what did you do to Dad?[8]He's acting really weird![9]Ashley, ask Dr Robins something.[10]Ask him who you are.[11]Why ask him that?[12]Just ask him and you'll see.[13]Huh?[14]Dad, you recognise me, right?[15]Huh?[16]Dad, answer me![17]Who am I, Dad?[18]Um... Who are you?[19]What?![20]Dad, it's me! Ashley![21]Ashley...?[22]Have I...met you somewhere before?[23]I'm sorry, I don't think I know you.[24]What?[25]Why are you calling me Dad?[26]What do you mean "why"?![27]I've only just got married, I don't have any[28]children.[29]Dad, this isn't funny![30]Why don't you know me?![31]Oh dear, how can I make you understand?[32]I'm not your father.[33]You really don't know me?[34]Actually, you do remind me of someone...[35]Oh, yes, you look like Sayoko.[36]Actually, where is she?[37]Where is Sayoko?[38]Dad...[39]The experiment is a success.[40]Ryan! What did you do to him?![41]I erased his memories.[42]Dr Robins has now forgotten the last 17 years[43]of his life.[44]So you no longer have a place in his memories.[45]What?[46]You're lying![47]It has to be a lie![48]I can't just be erased from his memories...[49]Is that you, Ryan?[50]Dr Robins, how are you feeling?[51]Ryan, what are you doing here? And why do[52]you look so much older?[53]Dr Robins, try not to speak too much. Your[54]brain is still sluggish from the experiment.[55]If you try to think too hard, you'll become[56]unwell.[57]Ohhâ€¦[58]I feel like something's missing...[59]What is it?[60]Dad, are you okay?[61]

[0]Ryan, how could you?[1]I did what you said to help Dad![2]I opened the box and brought the thing back![3]Ashley, calm down.[4]If you have brought the item from inside the [5]box as you said you would,[6]then I can restore your father's memories[7]without delay.[8]What do you mean?[9]Well, I am assuming that you have brought the[10]item as promised.[11]

[0]Show me, Ashley.[1]Show me what you brought back.[2]This.[3]This is what was in the box.[4]Is this all?[5]It has a connector, but this won't fit in the[6]control panel.[7]Ashley, is this really all that was in the box?[8]Yeah.[9]I see.[10]Well, that is a pity.[11]Why?[12]It appears to be nothing more than an extra[13]module.[14]I cannot use this for memory restoration,[15]Ashley.[16]It appears my theory was not entirely correct.[17]How unfortunate.[18]What's wrong?[19]I thought that the box must contain a [20]security key for Another,[21]something that Sayoko developed during the[22]EC Project.[23]However, it seems that there was no such key[24]in the box, correct?[25]And thus, I cannot restore Dr Robins' lost[26]memories.[27]But you promised![28]You said that if I opened the box and brought[29]back what was inside,[30]you wouldn't erase my dad's memories![31]I did promise that, yes. But you took such a[32]long time to return.[33]I assumed you had given up on your father[34]and simply gone home.[35]Gone home?[36]I wouldn't just leave my dad here![37]You wouldn't?[38]Of course not![39]I'm the only one who can help him![40]I wouldn't just run off![41]Honestly?[42]How can you say that?[43]I don't understand you, Ashley.[44]I don't understand why you wouldn't be willing[45]to turn your back on your father.[46]What's there to understand?[47]He's my dad![48]Ashley, is your father truly that important to[49]you?[50]Of course he is![51]Come on, Ryan! If it was your dad on the line,[52]in serious danger,[53]even you'd feel exactly the same as me![54]Would I?[55]I can't say I've ever considered it.[56]I've never felt anything like that about my[57]father. Not once.[58]Please, Ryan...[59]Give my dad his memories back![60]Please![61]Please...[62](sniff)[63]Ashley, are you crying?[64]Why would you be crying?[65]Because...my dad...[66]doesn't remember me...[67](sniff)[68]Ashley, stop crying, please.[69]I don't like seeing people cry.[70]Dad...[71](sniff)[72](sniff)[73]Ashley...[74]Stop crying! Now![75]Huh?[76]Don't make me repeat myself.[77]I don't like seeing people cry.[78]Why?[79]I believe that the emotions that trigger crying[80]are unnecessary for humans.[81]In fact, crying is more of a defence mechanism.[82]Nothing more.[83]A...defence mechanism?[84]Yes.[85]When the weak believe they will be subject to[86]emotional distress, they always resort to tears.[87]They pour their stress into these eye secretions[88]in an attempt to expel it from their own bodies.[89]It is a defence mechanism, designed to protect[90]people from their own feelings.[91]And even if those emotions are misguided, these[92]weak-hearted people justify them with tears.[93]The foremost example is small children whining[94]and crying.[95]From this, it seems fair to conclude that tears[96]are nothing more than a sign of weakness.[97]And thus, I despise crying.[98]You're wrong...[99]Am I?[100]You're totally wrong, Ryan.[101]Everyone cries, not just weak people.[102]We cry because our hearts are overwhelmed.[103]Oh, really?[104]What could possibly overwhelm your heart?[105]Our emotions.[106]If there's something you feel really sad about,[107]or if you're feeling really scared.[108]When you're feeling so lonely you can't take it.[109]Even when you're really happy...[110]The emotions overwhelm our hearts and we[111]start to cry.[112]Ryan, has that never happened to you?[113]Never.[114]Not once in my entire life.[115]You're lying.[116]I am not.[117]Ashley, I understand your theory regarding[118]tears and emotions.[119]So let me ask you something.[120]Using your previous statements as a base,[121]when you saw that Dr Robins had lost his[122]memories, your heart was overwhelmed.[123]So tell me, what emotion were you feeling?[124]Sorrow, because you were erased from your[125]father's memory?[126]Or anger, because I carried out the experiment[127]before you returned?[128]Neither.[129]Then what was it?[130]It was because I couldn't save Dad.[131]I was upset because there was nothing I could[132]do. It...it was regret.[133]Regret?[134]I see.[135]So such a situation can also give birth to tears.[136]Ashley, would you like to restore Dr Robins'[137]memories?[138]Of course![139]I see.[140]Then let us restore his memories.[141]Really?[142]Are you serious?[143]Indeed I am.[144]Provided, of course, you aid me with something.[145]With what?[146]A memory experiment.[147]If you aid me with my experiment, I will restore[148]your father's memories.[149]What kind of experiment?[150]A[151] memory overwrite experiment[152], with you as[153]the subject, using this data.[154]Mom's pendant![155]Ashley, to you this is a memento of your[156]mother, correct?[157]Yeah...[158]But to me, this is merely an old data sample,[159]memories extracted 13 years ago.[160]I wanted to find out what was in the memory[161]data, so I analysed it,[162]but I could not read the memories directly from[163]the mnemonic fluid.[164]So I wish to examine this memory data using a[165]different method.[166]Namely, a memory overwrite experiment.[167]This is the perfect data to use for such an[168]experiment.[169]And you are the [170]perfect test subject[171].[172]

[0]What's a memory overwrite experiment?[1]I will implant Sayoko Robins' memories into[2]your mind.[3]Implant them into my mind?[4]How does that work?[5]If successful, you will see Sayoko's memories as[6]your own.[7]They will become yours, so to speak.[8]Mom's memories will become mine?[9]Yes.[10]I believe this experiment is relevant to your[11]interests.[12]But the memories overwritten in the experiment[13]will be destroyed.[14]What?[15]Will I lose my memories?[16]I'm afraid so.[17]But don't worry. The experiment will not [18]destroy any brain cells.[19]The memory deletion will be [20]selective deletion[21].[22]

[0]Why am I the perfect test subject?[1]You shared Sayoko's body before you were[2]born, so your memories have a common source.[3]The foundations of your own memory were[4]created while you were inside Sayoko's womb.[5]Which means that you should have extremely[6]high compatibility with her memories.[7]

[0]What does selective deletion mean?[1]Your brain stores the memories which contain[2]data for both past and present events.[3]When implanting memory data from another[4]person into your mind,[5]the new memory will clash with a previously[6]existing memory.[7]And if the original memory is disposable,[8]your brain will erase it and overwrite it with[9]the new memory.[10]What do you mean by "disposable"?[11]A disposable memory is one that you want to[12]forget.[13]One that I want to forget?[14]Yes.[15]Ashley, you are 16 years old, correct?[16]By the time one turns 16, there must be many[17]experiences that one would wish to forget.[18]And these are the memories that will be[19]overwritten in the experiment.[20]Ryan...[21]What if there aren't any that I want to forget?[22]Who can say?[23]I have no data regarding such an occurrence.[24]
[0]Well, Ashley?[1]Will you aid me in my experiment if it means[2]the restoration of your father's memories?[3]I...[4]Answer me, Ashley.[5]
[0]What do I do?[1]Can I trust him?[2]But I have to save Dad...[3]
[0]I'll do it.[1]Excellent choice, Ashley.[2]When you have those memories implanted, I[3]will require you to tell me about them.[4]I know.[5]Well then, into Another you go.[6]
[0]Commencing the experiment.[1]

[0]Ashley, how are you feeling?[1]I feel kinda dizzy...[2]I see.[3]But there is nothing to worry about.[4]Overwriting memories is not as taxing on the[5]brain as removing them.[6]Now tell me.[7]Were Sayoko's memories [8]implanted into you?[9]
[0]Yeah[1]

[0]Yeah...[1]Then what memories did you receive?[2]Tell me.[3]I don't want to...[4]What?[5]Ashley, we had a deal.[6]I won't tell you anything about Mom![7]So you're breaking your promise?[8]Yeah. Just like you did.[9]I'm not telling you anything.[10]Ashley...[11]You couldn't possibly have rejected all of her[12]memories, could you?[13]Yeah! I did![14]What?[15]How could you be so foolish?[16]Foolish?[17]Sayoko's memories contain highly significant[18]information.[19]How could you reject them?[20]Ryan, the memories you gave me...[21]The ones in her pendant...[22]They were the most important things she had.[23]Which is exactly why I need to know.[24]What critical experimental results did the[25]mnemonic fluid contain?[26]You just don't get it![27]Mom's most important memories weren't about[28]research![29]Ryan, you don't understand my mom at all![30]Ashley...[31]

[0]No...[1]Impossible.[2]Don't lie to me, Ashley.[3]I'm not lying.[4]What?[5]You didn't have any disposable memories?[6]Not one?[7]Not a single one.[8]I didn't want to forget anything.[9]They're all important to me.[10]This is unfathomable.[11]You've rejected all of Sayoko's memories?[12]Ashley, I really thought that you were smarter[13]than this.[14]Hasn't it occurred to you that the memories of[15]your mother, a true genius,[16]are more important than your trifling, pathetic[17]recollections?[18]I don't care.[19]Ashley...[20]

[0]You're just like Dr Robins. Unhelpful to the[1]very end.[2]If the memories of her work are unreachable,[3]then the memory overwrite was meaningless.[4]I don't care whether your experiment was[5]important or not![6]What is important is my dad![7]I helped you, so put his memories back![8]Hahaha...hahaha...[9]Hahaha...hahaha...[10]That promise was made to be broken, Ashley.[11]What?[12]What's wrong? Didn't you hear me?[13]I'll tell you again.[14]That promise was made to be broken.[15]Ryan, you're the worst![16]You're breaking another promise?[17]Ashley, I have no more use for you. Leave.[18]No way...[19]Oh, are you going to cry again?[20]I wonder which emotion will overwhelm your[21]heart this time.[22]Sorrow? Anger? Regret?[23]I won't cry![24]What?[25]I won't cry in front of someone like you![26]You don't know how to cry, or even what to[27]feel![28]I am not going to cry in front of someone who[29]can't even understand basic emotions![30]I see.[31]I'm done. I don't need you.[32]I'm gonna give my dad back his memories by[33]myself![34]Oh?[35]And how do you plan to do that?[36]I'll use the TAS.[37]The TAS?[38]Ashley, you couldn't...[39]Yeah, I have it.[40]I have the device Mom made to unlock the[41]security on Another.[42]I see.[43]Ashley, give me the TAS.[44]I'll use it to restore your father's memories...[45]No way![46]What?[47]I'm not giving it to you![48]Oh, really?[49]Yeah, I wouldn't give it to a liar like you![50]That is a pity.[51]You see, I want it very much.[52]And I will do anything I can to get it.[53]Huh?[54]What are you going to do? Stop![55]You brought this upon yourself, Ashley.[56]Didn't you?[57]Ashley, give me the TAS.[58]Stop![59]Stop it![60]

[0]Dr Robins, kindly get out of my way.[1]Ashley, give me the TAS, now.[2]No![3]I won't give it to you![4]If you don't, I'll shoot.[5]Stop![6]Ryan, put down that gun![7]Dr Robins...[8]You don't know this child. You don't need to[9]protect her.[10]Please get out of the way.[11]Ryan, stop![12]Out of my way.[13]If not, I won't hesitate to pull the trigger.[14]

[0]Mr Alfred![1]Ugh...[2]Wait here, I'll go get help.[3]Ashley...[4]Don't worry...it's only a flesh wound...[5]More importantly, Richard...[6]Mr Alfred, Ryan erased his memories.[7]He doesn't recognise me any more...[8]If you had the TAS...you could restore his[9]memories...[10]Sayoko created it...to unlock Another...[11]Ohhâ€¦[12]Is this what I need?[13]What is that?[14]It's the TAS.[15]So you had it all this time...[16]She made it in case Another was used for the[17]wrong reasons...[18]And only I can use it.[19]So I can use it to save Dad.[20]Mr Alfred, what do I do?[21]Go into the control room and use the TAS.[22]That room over there?[23]Yes. Insert the TAS into the control panel.[24]
[0]Mr Alfred![1]Restore Richard's memories. Use the TAS,[2]Ashley...[3]
[0]Where are you going, Ashley?[1]
[0]I can't leave Dad here![1]
[0]Ashley, where are you going?[1]Oh yeah... I have to unlock the laptop.[2]
[0]I need to go after Ryan.[1]
[0]So this is the control room...[1]
[0]There's some kind of round thing...[1]Is that the control panel?[2]That's the one.[3]
[0]There is a[1] control panel[2].[3]
[0]Richard![1]Get inside Another![2]Okay...[3]
[0]Ashley, insert the TAS.[1]I'll restore your memories, Dad.[2]Just wait...[3]
[0]Do it, Ashley.[1]Okay.[2]
[0]I have to go check on him![1]
[0]Quick, Ashley, insert the TAS.[1]Okay.[2]
[0]I have to restore Dad's memory![1]
[0]I have to restore Dad's memory![1]
[0]This isn't the time to use the VC.[1]

[0]Dad![1]It's me...[2]This is...[3]Dad, do you know where you are?[4]Isn't this the Another lab?[5]Yeah![6]Ashley![7]Dad![8]You recognise me![9]Of course I do![10]You're serious, right?[11]You bet.[12]You're my one and only daughter. You're the[13]most important thing in the whole world to me.[14]My sweet Ashley.[15]Dad![16]Ashley![17]I'm so glad...you remember me...[18]Dad...[19](sniff)[20]I'm sorry, Ashley. I'm sorry for what I did to[21]you.[22]Dad...[23]Don't ever say you don't know me. Never[24]again, okay?[25]I promise.[26]Because you're...[27]my one and only Dad...[28]Ashley...[29]Dad, why did Ryan attack you and do all this?[30]Was it just because he wanted to use Another?[31]No...[32]Ashley, I think Ryan knew.[33]He knew that I was digging up the truth about[34]Sayoko's death.[35]Dad...[36]

[0]Richard...[1]Rex, are you all right?[2]Yes, the bullet didn't hit anything major.[3]But more importantly...[4]Please, get the laptop in the control room.[5]The laptop?[6]Yes. It's extremely important.[7]All right, I'll get it now.[8]
[0]Ashley, I'm sorry about all this.[1]Mr Alfred...[2]
[0]Did you get it, Richard?[1]Is this the one?[2]Wait![3]
[0]I remember now...[1]This laptop...[2]Judd had it, he was standing by the window...[3]Ashley?[4]Huh?[5]
[0]Ashley, what's wrong?[1]Dad...[2]I've seen this laptop before.[3]What?[4]It was in Judd's villa.[5]I just remembered.[6]Ashley, are you sure?[7]Yeah...[8]
[0]Yeah, it was this one.[1](gasp)[2]
[0]I remember now...[1]Mom was standing beside Judd...[2]She had the laptop, she was writing something[3]on it...[4]Mom...[5]

[0]Ashley?[1]Dad...[2]I remembered again... Mom was holding this.[3]What?[4]Mom had it, she was using the screen.[5]Sayoko was holding it?[6]Are you sure, Ashley?[7]Yeah.[8]Rex, what is this?[9]It was Judd's.[10]When Ryan restarted the Another experiments[11]and attacked you, he stole this from my office.[12]What's in it?[13]It should have Judd's research results.[14]It's still locked, though.[15]Richard...[16]What is it, Rex?[17]The only ones who knew the code were Judd...[18]and possibly Sayoko?[19]Ashley, you said Sayoko used this?[20]Yeah, she touched the screen as if she was[21]drawing a letter.[22]
[0]Ashley, can you reproduce the letter that[1]Sayoko drew?[2]Um...I'll give it a try... [3]

[0]Oh...[1]Dad![2]There's a message appearing on the screen.[3]As far as most people are concerned, memory[4]is a dynamically self-developing process that[5]functions to connect past and present.[6]To me, however, it is the sole object of my[7]research, the source of my most fundamental[8]discoveries, of my joys, of the fascination that[9]drove me to my most pioneering work.[10]How different it seems, now that I am [11]contemplating my own death.[12]Now memory is nothing more than a record[13]of my past,[14]and that past is full of sorrow, regret and[15]repentance.[16]I chose to be a scientist. I followed the path[17]that I believed in.[18]But all of the fame, all of the riches I gained are[19]worthless to me.[20]Perhaps I have gone from being Judd Fitzgerald,[21]eminent scientist,[22]to being nothing more than another man[23]among many.[24]And now that I am reduced to this, I cannot[25]allow myself to go on living as I have done.[26]The fame and fortune I gained as a scientist[27]were not from my work alone.[28]I gained them through the sacrifice of Sayoko[29]Robins and Ryan Gray.[30]And now I leave this world, without being able[31]to repent for what I have done.[32]Sayoko, forgive me...[33]When you refused to be my successor, the[34]paternal love I had for you turned to hatred.[35]I stole your memories, the one thing you never[36]wanted to lose.[37]And then one of my former employees stole[38]your very life.[39]I cannot but regret all I have done and all that[40]has been done to you.[41]And Ryan...[42]I am to die without ever telling you the most[43]important thing in the world.[44]I know that you have a terrible secret that you[45]have never told to another soul.[46]You have no memories of your own childhood.[47]I know how this came to be, Ryan.[48]It is because I am your father, and also the one[49]responsible for your memory loss.[50]When your mother died protecting you in an[51]accident, you were inconsolable.[52]You refused to accept that your mother had[53]truly left this world.[54]And after crying for days on end, you closed[55]up and refused to speak to anyone.[56]You locked away your little heart.[57]I didn't know what to do. I held you close to me[58]every single day.[59]As your father, I felt your pain and suffering[60]tenfold. And then I made my decision.[61]At the time, it seemed that it was the least[62]painful option I had.[63]I decided to remove your mother's life and[64]death from your memory,[65]even though I knew that it would also remove[66]your memories of me, your father.[67]I used a formula I had prepared in my lab to[68]erase your memories.[69]I gave you over to someone I trusted and then[70]distanced myself from you.[71]When we met again, I had no idea how I should[72]treat you.[73]I didn't know what we were to each other any[74]more.[75]Ryan, I believe that you will surpass me one day[76]as a scientist.[77]But I will never be able to see that with my own[78]eyes.[79]Forgive me, Ryan...[80]Forgive your foolish father, who could never[81]build up the courage to tell you the truth.[82]I cannot allow myself to continue living like[83]this.[84]Judd was Ryan's father?[85]I can't believe it...[86]

[0]Rex, did you know about Judd and Ryan?[1]No, I had no idea.[2]I would never have imagined that something like[3]that was stored on this laptop...[4]Did you know that Ryan had no memories of[5]his childhood?[6]Actually, I asked him once what his most vivid[7]childhood memory was.[8]He told me that childhood memories were[9]useless, and that he didn't want to remember.[10]Did he know that Judd was his real father?[11]No, I'm sure he never opened that laptop.[12]I don't think he knows the truth.[13]But if he does...[14]Richard, he might...[15]I'll go after him.[16]I need to ask him something anyway.[17]Richard...[18]Rex, please look after Ashley.[19]Leave it to me.[20]No, Dad![21]I'm going with you.[22]Ashley, you should wait here.[23]I'm going with you.[24]But...[25]Dad, take me with you! I have to do this![26]Okay, Ashley, let's go.[27]Right.[28]
[0]How do I do this?[1]
[0]Ashley, what did your mother write on that[1]laptop screen?[2]She wrote the letter "J".[3]Try writing that.[4]
[0]Ryan went down in the lift.[1]
[0]Ashley, what did your mother write on that[1]laptop screen?[2]She wrote the letter "J".[3]Try writing that.[4]
[0]We need to get help for Rex. Better call[1]someone...[2]
[0]Ashley, call Gina on the VC.[1]Get her to help Rex.[2]Okay.[3]

[0]Ashley![1]And Dr Robins is there too, what a relief...[2]Gina, Elizabeth's dad is injured![3]The director? What happened?[4]Dr Robins, I'm glad you're okay![5]Mike, there's been an accident in the Another[6]lab. Rex needs medical attention.[7]I'll give you the details later.[8]Understood.[9]
[0]Ashley, take the elevator down.[1]We need to go after Ryan.[2]Okay, Dad.[3]
[0]I need to unlock the laptop.[1]
[0]I have to get help on the VC![1]
[0]Gina will look after Rex. Come on, let's go[1]after Ryan![2]
[0]The lab has a tunnel underneath it?[1]Ashley...[2]Ashley, we need to get moving.[3]Right.[4]
[0]Where are you going, Ashley?[1]We need to find Ryan![2]

[0]Dad, where does the tunnel go?[1]It ends in a forest behind the lab.[2]Can we get out into the forest?[3]Yes, there's a door at the end of the tunnel.[4]There's a small spring in the forest, and the[5]path leads to a wharf on the lake.[6]You can get a boat from the wharf to a little[7]island out on the lake.[8]An island? I never saw it before...[9]Yes, it's tiny. It's only good for walking around[10]on.[11]I used to go over there with Sayoko when we[12]came here...[13]You went there with Mom?[14]Yeah, just the two of us.[15]But that was long before you were born.[16]Ah...[17]

[0]There is a [1]wooden gate[2] at the top [3]of some small stone steps.[4]Is that the way into the forest?[5]Yes, I'm sure of it.[6]I'll open it.[7]Huh?[8]It won't open...[9]Let me try.[10]Nngh![11]I can't get it open either...[12]It must be locked from the other side. Probably[13]by Ryan.[14]What do we do?[15]We need to find another way out.[16]Yeah...[17]
[0]There is a[1] wooden gate[2].[3]It is locked.[4]
[0]Ashley, check out the door.[1]
[0]Dad, let's look down here.[1]All right.[2]
[0]Dad, there's no way out here.[1]This isn't the way to the forest, Ashley.[2]It's a little further on.[3]Okay...[4]

[0]There are some [1]large rocks [2]at the [3]back of the cave.[4]Hey, I can see light coming through the gaps[5]between the rocks![6]Ashley, there might be a shortcut behind those[7]rocks.[8]I'll move them away.[9]I'll help![10]Let me do it, Ashley.[11]It might be dangerous, so stand back.[12]Okay...[13]Here we go![14]Be careful, Dad![15]And one![16]And two![17]And thrrrgh![18]I can see out![19]You did it, Dad![20]Yeah...[21]Come on, let's go.[22]
[0]It's getting brighter out here...[1]It'll be dawn soon.[2]Which way should we go?[3]There's a spring straight ahead.[4]Let's go there first.[5]Okay.[6]
[0]Ashley![1]Yeah?[2]Turn right there to get to the spring.[3]Got it.[4]
[0]Not that way, Ashley.[1]
[0]No footprints. Ryan hasn't been by here...[1]Wow! It's beautiful.[2]Ashley, this place is known as the secret spring.[3]

[0]What are you looking at?[1]The spring water.[2]Dan once told me that this is the source of[3]Lake Juliet's water.[4]Really?[5]The whole lake is filled from here.[6]Look at it, Ashley.[7]The lake might have been polluted more than[8]once in the past.[9]But as long as this water remains clear and[10]pure, the lake will always recover.[11]But it's polluted now. Do you think it can still[12]recover?[13]You know about the lake pollution?[14]I found out when I was using your computer.[15]And I used the testing kit in your drawer to[16]check the lake water.[17]Ah...[18]

[0]Dad...[1]This is so beautiful.[2]It is.[3]Do you think the lake can be pure and clear[4]like this again?[5]I'm sure it can.[6]But there's a lot that we must do to help.[7]Yeah...[8]Ashley, let's go to the wharf and find Ryan.[9]Right.[10]
[0]Dad, can I check the water with the testing kit?[1]There's no time now, we have to find Ryan.[2]Right...[3]
[0]Dad...[1]Ashley, let's go to the wharf and find Ryan.[2]
[0]Hey, that boat![1]
[0]Ryan's on it![1]
[0]Ryan![1]Dad, he's...[2]He's going to the island.[3]Ashley, let's go after him![4]Right![5]
[0]Dad![1]There's a boat here![2]Get in![3]Okay![4]
[0]Ashley, let's go after him![1]Right![2]
[0]Ashley![1]Huh?[2]Where are you going? Get in the boat![3]Right.[4]

[0]Ashley, can you see Ryan's boat?[1]No, not any more.[2]Are you tired?[3]It'll be a while yet before we reach the island.[4]You can sleep if you want.[5]No, I'm fine.[6]Everything's just happened so quickly. I'm not[7]sleepy at all.[8]Okay.[9]Dad, can I ask you something?[10]What is it?[11]It's about something Ryan said.[12]He said that you didn't come here to help with[13]Another,[14]you came here to find Mom's real killer.[15]Is that true?[16]Yes, it's true.[17]I've been thinking, ever since I came back from[18]Blood Edward Island...[19]It was definitely Bill who broke into the house[20]and shot Sayoko 13 years ago.[21]But I wasn't sure if he was the only one behind[22]the whole thing.[23]Or whether there was someone behind the [24]scenes, pulling his strings,[25]all that time he was helping me develop[26]Another on the island.[27]And when I thought about it, one name[28]instantly came to mind.[29]Judd Fitzgerald.[30]Only Judd could have made Bill do what he did.[31]But he was already dead, so there was no way[32]of getting the truth from him.[33]Then, a year ago, I got an anonymous e-mail.[34]It said that there was another person[35]responsible for Sayoko's death.[36]And when I saw that e-mail it clicked.[37]If there was anyone still alive who knew the [38]truth behind what Bill had done,[39]they would be at JC Valley.[40]So, does anyone know who it was?[41]Yes...[42]Who?[43]Well...[44]You'll find out soon enough.[45]Huh?[46]Ashley, can you see the island?[47]Yeah, I can see it now.[48]

[0]We're here.[1]Yes...[2]It really is tiny, isn't it?[3]That's right. It's so small it doesn't even have[4]a name.[5]Are you tired?[6]Don't worry. I'm stronger than you might think.[7]This won't faze me.[8]But, Ashley...[9]Yeah?[10]Looks like I dragged you into a big mess again,[11]hmm?[12]Just like two years ago...[13]You didn't drag me into anything.[14]If you want to find out, then so do I, Dad.[15]That's all there is to it.[16]I'm with you all the way.[17]Thank you, Ashley.[18]Let's go find Ryan, then.[19]Right.[20]

[0]Dr Robins![1]Ryan![2]Ryan...[3]Ashley, you're here too?[4]Ryan, just take it easy. Rex is fine.[5]I see.[6]He was more worried about you than his own[7]injury.[8]Worried? About me?[9]Yes. He forgives you for the attack, the[10]experiment, working with Sofia...everything.[11]He was just worried about you.[12]I don't need him to be worried about me.[13]But more importantly...[14]Dr Robins, do you have your memories back?[15]Yes, I do.[16]I used the TAS.[17]I see...[18]You used the TAS to restore the 17 years of[19]memories I erased.[20]That's right.[21]Yeah, Dad got his memories back thanks to [22]Mom's invention![23]I see.[24]I had expected as much.[25]The work that so many scientists spent so[26]many years to complete,[27]was all undone by one scientist who died over[28]a decade ago.[29]Doesn't it make everything seem so pointless?[30]Pointless?[31]Yes.[32]You, I and Rex were brought to MJ Labs[33]by Judd.[34]All of us were trained by him.[35]We began our memory research under him,[36]trying to get the results that he sought.[37]We're still trying to get them, even now.[38]But all of our research is confined by that[39]security system laid down by Judd and Sayoko.[40]So even now, no matter how hard we work,[41]those restrictions kept us from our results.[42]You're wrong, Ryan.[43]Judd and Sayoko developed that system by[44]considering the idea of memory control[45]from every possible angle, and how people[46]would react to such a device.[47]You can't think of that as a restriction.[48]Really?[49]I can't agree with that.[50]Those two had no plans of ever passing on the[51]leadership of memory research to anyone.[52]Which is why they put restrictions on the[53]system itself.[54]Dr Robins, the woman you loved was cruel[55]indeed.[56]What did you say?[57]She was Judd's most trusted confidante, the[58]successor that everyone expected so much of.[59]She was even tasked with the development of[60]the primary system for the EC Project.[61]And yet, as soon as she married you, she turned[62]her back on those expectations and his trust.[63]She knew how important she was to the[64]EC Project, yet she just took off.[65]And what's worse, she hid crucial information[66]about the system.[67]No![68]She didn't turn her back on anyone![69]She...[70]She wanted to live as my mother, not as a[71]scientist![72]And what do you base this theory on?[73]When Mom made the TAS upgrade module,[74]she recorded a message just for me.[75]She knew, Ryan.[76]She knew people wanted her as a scientist.[77]And that if she didn't listen, her life might[78]be in danger.[79]In danger?[80]She knew from the beginning that she might be[81]killed?[82]Yes, Ryan.[83]She thought that far ahead when she decided [84]to hide the Another thesis.[85]She hid it because she knew people wanted to[86]develop and use it for the wrong reasons.[87]And Bill was one of them.[88]Bill Edward.[89]The man who killed her.[90]Ryan...how do you know that?[91]I simply read it in your memory data when I[92]extracted it.[93]Don't lie, Ryan.[94]Pardon?[95]You knew that Bill had killed Sayoko right from[96]the day I arrived here.[97]The very first day I came, you said:[98]"Dr Robins, please tell me about the Another[99]you created on Blood Edward Island."[100]When I heard that, I was taken aback.[101]I had told Rex about Another and about Bill.[102]But I had never told him where Another was[103]created.[104]So, how did you know that I created it on[105]Blood Edward Island, Ryan?[106]Well...[107]Answer me![108]The other person responsible for Sayoko's[109]death...[110]The one who had Bill kill her...[111]Who was it?[112]Was it Judd?[113]Or was it...[114]

[0]Dr Robins.[1]Your theory is correct. The one who chased[2]Sayoko to her death was none other than...[3]Me.[4]What?![5]So it was you![6]I was happy and relieved when Sayoko left the[7]EC Project.[8]I believed I was next in line to be Judd's[9]successor.[10]But the reality was quite different.[11]Judd refused to give up on Sayoko, and insisted[12]on getting her back.[13]I told him then that I would complete Another[14]for him,[15]but he told me that I was the wrong person.[16]When Bill heard that, he told me:[17]"Ryan, do you know why Judd doesn't want you[18]to be his successor?"[19]"It's because he's your father."[20]"And he doesn't want you to know that, so he[21]won't name you as successor."[22]He told you that?[23]Indeed he did.[24]And everything he told me was absolutely true.[25]Bill knew that I had no memories of my[26]childhood.[27]He told me that Judd had fed me a formula[28]that erased my memories.[29]And the only ones who knew about it were[30]Judd, Bill and Sayoko.[31]And when he told me that, I laughed out loud.[32]I laughed at myself. At my foolishness.[33]My own father had used me as a test subject[34]for his memory experiment.[35]And without even knowing it, I had seen that[36]man as a mentor, and looked up to him.[37]I have never mocked myself as much as I did[38]on that day.[39]But I managed to regain my cool and analyse[40]the reasons why Bill had told me what he did.[41]On the one hand, he was one of the people who[42]wanted to use Another for his own purposes.[43]On the other hand, he was someone that Judd[44]trusted implicitly.[45]I hypothesised that he was attempting to make[46]me his partner and aid him.[47]That was my theory. And when I confirmed it[48]was true, I made my decision.[49]I would pretend to ally myself with Bill,[50]while at the same time taking my own brand[51]of revenge against Judd Fitzgerald.[52]My targets were his chosen successor, Sayoko,[53]and his research results, all of his successes.[54]I would take them away, one by one, as he did[55]with my memories.[56]I promised Bill I would help him get the Another[57]thesis that Sayoko had hidden.[58]I steadily worked my way into his favour and[59]then began to put ideas into his head.[60]If Sayoko died, leaving the thesis behind, what[61]would the man who loved her[62]and wrote that thesis with her do?[63]And so, because I knew that Bill loved Sayoko, [64]it was easy to inflame his jealousy towards you.[65]And, indeed, his mixed feelings of love and hate[66]for Sayoko.[67]Ryan![68]How could you do such a thing?[69]Bill then went on and killed Sayoko, completely[70]unaware that I was pulling the strings.[71]He became best friends with you, and[72]convinced you to develop Another.[73]I had not even dared to hope that my plans[74]would go so smoothly, but they did.[75]Then I worked with Bill, and began removing the[76]things that Judd held precious to him.[77]The funding disaster that befell MJ Labs was,[78]of course, orchestrated by me.[79]But when Judd suddenly died six years ago, my[80]revenge was unexpectedly halted.[81]And then Bill died on Blood Edward Island[82]two years ago.[83]Before I realised it, the only thing left to me[84]was the shell of JC Valley,[85]and the incomplete Another that Judd had[86]left behind.[87]Dr Robins, I was the one who sent you that[88]e-mail.[89]To bring you here, to JC Valley.[90]I suspected you'd sent it...[91]Yes, indeed.[92]Ryan![93]Why would you send him that?[94]Why do you think?[95]Don't you understand how I feel about all of[96]this, even after hearing my story?[97]No![98]I don't understand you at all![99]And I don't want to![100]Why?[101]Why did you have to kill Mom...[102]just for your revenge?[103]Why did you have to make Bill kill her?![104]If you hated Judd, why not just take revenge[105]there and then?[106]Why did you take away Mom?[107]Why were you so cruel...[108]that you had to kill Mom?[109]When I met Bill on Blood Edward Island[110]two years ago...[111]I remembered looking through the closet where[112]Mom had hid me...[113]I remember Bill's face as he shot Mom...[114]For me, then, remembering that time was...[115]Remembering things I'd forgotten was...[116]It was horrible. But I didn't know how horrible[117]it really was.[118]Ryan, you were the one who told me, right?[119]You told me Dad brought me here to open the[120]doorway to my memories.[121]But you were wrong.[122]The one who opened that doorway and brought[123]me on that journey into my memories...[124]It was Mom.[125]She started me on that journey.[126]She told me and showed me just how much she[127]loved me.[128]But if she was still alive...[129]If she hadn't been killed...[130]Then...[131]I'd never have had to go on this journey![132]Ashley...[133]Do you understand why I sent that e-mail to[134]Dr Robins?[135]No![136]Then I will tell you.[137]This is what I had planned, Dr Robins.[138]

[0]First, I intended to convince you that everything[1]I did was part of Judd's plan.[2]And I would get you to co-operate with me in[3]completing Another.[4]After that, I would sell it to the company Bill[5]had been dealing with.[6]And thus, my revenge on Judd Fitzgerald would[7]finally be complete.[8]But you didn't do it, Ryan.[9]Why not?[10]Because of you, Dr Robins.[11]You trusted me from the very beginning. Just[12]like you did with Bill.[13]How can you trust someone else so completely?[14]It's basic human nature, Ryan.[15]I cannot accept that.[16]Why didn't you ever doubt me?[17]Oh, I had my doubts about you from the[18]start.[19]You did?[20]Then why didn't you carry out your revenge[21]on me? Why not avenge your wife?[22]Ryan...[23]Why?[24]I don't understand you at all.[25]You should be thirsting for revenge.[26]Dr Robins, if I were to shoot Ashley here, right[27]now, in front of you,[28]what would you do?[29]Would you take revenge?[30]Could you go on without killing me in return?[31]Stop![32]Don't push me, Ryan![33]I'm not out for revenge![34]Don't you understand, Ryan?[35]Don't you understand the suffering of a man[36]whose wife was taken away from him?[37]Every night...[38] Every single night, I[39]dream of killing the man who did it.[40]And my hands...[41]They still remember the warmth of Sayoko's[42]dying body, her blood flowing out...[43]The sorrow and hatred I felt 13 years ago[44]hasn't lessened one bit since then.[45]I haven't gone a single day without feeling it.[46]But I won't let that sorrow turn into vengeance.[47]And do you know why?[48]Because Sayoko would never have wanted [49]that to happen![50]When I found Sayoko, dying, 13 years ago...[51]When I held her as she took her last breaths, I[52]asked her who had done it.[53]She said "He wanted...Another..."[54]And then she died before saying who it was.[55]Do you know why she didn't say any more?[56]Because Bill was her friend![57]That's why, Ryan![58]She shook her head gently, and a single tear[59]fell from her eye.[60]Which is why I...[61]Didn't go out for revenge?[62]Is this true, Dr Robins?[63]If I were to lower this gun and give it to you,[64]and then stand right in front of you as you held[65]the gun...[66]The man responsible for Sayoko's[67]death just standing before you.[68]Would you still be able to keep your sorrow[69]and hatred from turning into vengeance?[70]It might even make your pain go away.[71]

[0]Dr Robins, I am the man who caused your[1]wife's death.[2]Ryan, I will never forgive you for what you've[3]done.[4]Dad, stop![5]Don't stop me, Ashley...[6]Stop, Dad! Stop![7]Shooting him won't bring Mom back![8]It won't make your pain go away![9]Ashley...[10]Dad...[11]So, I am not even worth shooting.[12]
[0]Goodbye, Ashley...[1]Dad! He's going to...[2]
[0]Ryan...[1]Let go of me.[2]No![3]I won't let you die here.[4]I won't let you run away.[5]Only the weak take their own lives. And you[6]despise the weak, don't you?[7]Dad![8]
[0]Dad![1]Are you okay?[2]

[0]Ryan...[1]Dying won't change anything.[2]It won't absolve you of your crimes. Or of [3]Sayoko's death.[4]You have to live on...and pay for your crimes.[5]And you have to figure out for yourself,[6]why Judd removed your memories.[7]Why he removed the most important thing in[8]the world to you.[9]You have to understand his reasons, and the[10]suffering that lay behind them.[11]Ryan, it's okay to cry now. You can stop[12]holding it all back.[13]

[0]After that, Dad, Ryan and I got on the boat[1]and went back to JC Valley.[2]Dad took me to his office, laid out a makeshift[3]bed and told me to sleep for a while.[4]I wanted to go to Mrs Graham's house to pick[5]up Matt,[6]but Dad told me not to worry and tucked me in.[7]Then, while I slept, Dad had a long talk with[8]Ryan.[9]When I woke up, Dad was there and we went[10]back to his cottage together.[11]We didn't talk the whole way back.[12]But we didn't need to. We both understood.[13]We both felt each other's pain. About Mom,[14]about everything...[15]

[0]Ashley![1]Dad...[2]Are you ready?[3]Yep.[4]I'm sorry I can't go back with you.[5]Don't worry about it, I know how much you[6]have to do here.[7]I'll be fine on my own, I'm sure Jessica's[8]dying for me to get back.[9]Ashley, tell Jessica that I'll be back next week.[10]Definitely this time.[11]You bet.[12]What'll happen to Ryan?[13]Ah, yes.[14]Ryan promised me that he'd turn himself in for[15]his crimes.[16]He's on his way to the police now.[17]Right...[18]Ashley, he...[19]Wait, Dad. I'm not ready to talk about it yet.[20]So much has happened... I'm still recovering.[21]That makes sense...[22]So, what's going to happen to JC Valley?[23]There was an article in the paper this morning.[24]It put the blame on JC Valley for the water[25]pollution five years ago.[26]So I believe things won't exactly be quiet at the[27]lab for a good while.[28]Rex said that he was going to openly admit[29]everything that the lab had done.[30]He's thought long and hard, and decided on[31]everything that needs to be done from here on.[32]Of course, I'll help in any way I can.[33]But after that...[34]What then?[35]What do you want me to do?[36]Dad...[37]Ashley, when I get home, we can sit down and[38]talk.[39]We can decide everything that we'll do[40]from now on.[41]Sounds perfect.[42]

[0]Huh?[1]Phone call.[2]This is Dr Robins.[3]Oh, Bob.[4]I'm sorry I asked you to do that out of[5]nowhere this morning...[6]Oh, you've already asked him?[7]Yes.[8]Oh, I see...[9]And then?[10]I see, I see.[11]Thanks a lot, Bob.[12]I owe you one. Bye![13]That was Bob on the phone?[14]Yes.[15]Ashley, I asked Bob to do something for me.[16]What?[17]I asked him to get the full story about the man[18]who fell from the clock tower five years ago.[19]Apparently the guy who saw it was an old[20]acquaintance of Bob's.[21]Does that mean...[22]Yes, Ashley.[23]I want to know what happened to Matt's dad[24]too.[25]And I asked Bob what he knew about it.[26]Dad...[27]This is what Bob heard:[28]Five years ago, his friend was out by the clock[29]tower,[30]and he heard the loud splash of something[31]hitting the water.[32]He didn't see a person falling?[33]Exactly.[34]It was just a big splash![35]It seems that it spread like Chinese whispers,[36]changing into something completely different.[37]I'm sure that if the matter is looked into more[38]thoroughly, the truth will come out.[39]Thanks, Dad.[40]I'm worried about your friend too, Ashley.[41]Oh, the bus is coming soon.[42]Right.[43]I'll take off, then.[44]I'll go with you to the bus stop.[45]

[0]Dad, you told Matt what time the bus was,[1]right?[2]I did indeed.[3]He said wild dogs wouldn't stop him from seeing[4]you off. I'm sure he's waiting somewhere.[5]Right.[6]Ashley![7]Huh?[8]Dan![9]Morning, Dr Robins.[10]Good morning, Dan.[11]You're seeing Ashley off?[12]Yes, I am.[13]Dan, thanks for finding my bag.[14]No problem, miss. I should be thanking you[15]you for finding Matthew.[16]Huh?[17]Dr Robins told me the whole story.[18]About how you found him and you were looking[19]after him.[20]You don't need to worry about him any more.[21]He'll be just fine.[22]Dad...[23]It's okay, Ashley. I told Dan everything.[24]He's going to take Matt back to his uncle's[25]personally.[26]That's right![27]Dan, where's Matt now?[28]He went to look at the lake.[29]Said he wanted to see it just one last time[30]before he left.[31]I'm meeting him at the mermaid statue in a[32]while and then we'll head for his uncle's place.[33]Dan, he's a good kid. He ran away to find his[34]dad...[35]I know, Ashley.[36]I figured out from talking to him how driven he[37]was to find his pops.[38]Why, that boy phoned his uncle himself to[39]apologise for making him worry so much.[40]Oh, okay.[41]I also have a message from Mrs Graham for[42]you, miss.[43]Really?[44]She said you were welcome to visit her gardens[45]any time.[46]I can't believe you're friends with that old[47]battleaxe! Not many people can say that.[48]I guess so.[49]Oh, yeah.[50]When I went over to Mrs Graham's to pick up[51]Matthew, I saw she had a visitor.[52]She wasn't expecting anyone, from what I could[53]tell. And you won't believe who it was![54]It was her daughter, come back to see her after[55]five years away from home.[56]Said she was worried about her ma, living out[57]here, all on her own.[58]To be totally honest with you, I feel better[59]knowing her daughter came back.[60]Well, I'd like to stay and chat all day, but[61]duty calls. Back to patrolling![62]Goodbye, Dan! Thanks for everything![63]Come and see us again, miss![64]Let's go, Ashley.[65]Right.[66]
[0]No sign of Matt...[1]

[0]Woof?[1]That's...[2]Princess![3]So you came to see me off too, huh?[4]Thanks for everything, Princess.[5]Elizabeth was looking for you, did you see her?[6]Woof![7]Really? Great![8]That's good to hear.[9]I'll be back, okay?[10]I'll never forget how you helped me find Matt,[11]Princess. Thanks so much.[12]Woof![13]See you, Princess![14]
[0]I'm gonna go find Matt, Dad.[1]I'm sure he's around here somewhere.[2]

[0]Elizabeth![1]What are you doing here?[2]Oh, a fine greeting that is, Ashley Mizuki Robins.[3]Especially for someone who's come to see you[4]off.[5]Really?[6]Daddy just got back from the hospital.[7]He told me the whole story.[8]About Ryan, about Dr Robins...and about you.[9]Elizabeth, your dad really...[10]It's okay, Ashley.[11]He told me everything.[12]About the woman he was seeing, the article in[13]the paper about the lab...[14]I've never heard him talk so much.[15]And he apologised for hiding Mom's letters.[16]I'm glad you made up, Elizabeth.[17]Ashley, Daddy said something to me...[18]"I'm going to change, Elizabeth. I have to."[19]So if Daddy's going to change, then I'm[20]going to try to change a bit too.[21]That's great to hear.[22]Right.[23]We'll see each other again, right, Elizabeth?[24]Totally![25]Matt, too.[26]Huh?[27]

[0]Ash![1]Oh![2]Matt![3]Hey, Ash![4]I'm sorry I left you alone, Matt.[5]It's okay, Ash.[6]Mrs Graham let me sleep at her place.[7]When I woke up, your dad called and said he'd[8]met up with you.[9]Right.[10]Ash, I kept my promise.[11]I'm going to go back to my uncle's place.[12]Dan said that you called him yourself.[13]Yeah.[14]I said I was sorry for making him worry, and I[15]told him what I'd found out about Dad.[16]And then he told me something awesome![17]Really? What?[18]Someone saw a man fitting Dad's description![19]Really?[20]Really![21]The police called my uncle and told him.[22]Matt, that's great![23]Yeah, totally![24]Ashley, when I was about to give up, you said,[25]"Your dad's not dead. He's alive."[26]And I kept on believing it.[27]I believed he was alive...[28]I'm sure you'll get to see him![29]Let's make a promise, Ash.[30]I'll find my dad and I'll come back here so we[31]can see each other again.[32]You got it! Promise![33]Hey, I want in too![34]You bet.[35]Right, time for me to take off.[36]See you again, Ash.[37]And thanks for everything, Dr Robins.[38]Of course.[39]See you![40]Ciao, Ashley![41]

[0]Ashley...[1]Aren't you sad, saying goodbye to your[2]friends?[3]Nah.[4]I know I'll see them again.[5]Yes, that's right.[6]Let's grab Jessica and your friends sometime,[7]and we can all go camping together.[8]Awesome![9]But, Dad, uh...[10]When we do...[11]I know, I know.[12]I'll remember to bring the charcoal.[13]Perfect![14]
